Lloyd, thePrime Hinister of Newfoundland, left on the 19th Ilovem-ber, and that he is expected, to arrive in this country onthe 26th instant, (3d) McPoA, Hankey, Secretary, War Cabinet.2 Whitshall Gardens, 3.7.,hovember 20th, 1918,\
